metadata.title: LYRAE Bow Scrunchies Bowknot Scarf Ponytail Holder Elastic Hair Ties Ropes Colorful Design For Women Girls
features: Adds elegant femme vibes to your hair style
Holds your strands beautifully and softly
Vibrant tropical colors and well designed patterns
Knotted bow is removable and self-tie
description: Style and secure your strands, do usual updo or ponytail with this perfectly designed Lyrae bow scrunchie. Vibrant tropical patterned scrunchie with a scarf, it gives you so many styling ideas with one hair accessory. Get ready for the compliments you are going to hear!
